definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: cut off, break off, gain by violence (so NH, Ar. bad.a9a, Eth. bas’9a: Aram. [[בְּחַע]])—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִבְחָָע]] Job 27:8, [[יִבְחָָעוּ]] Joe 2:8; Imv. sf. [[בְּחָ֫עַם בְּרׂאשׁ]] Am 9:1; Inf. [[בְּחׂעַ]] Ez Eze 22:27; Pt. [[בּוֹחֵעַ]] Pr 15:27, Je 6:13, [[בּׂחֵעַ]] Ps 10:3 + 3 t.;—cut off, break off (c. acc. capitals of pillars) Am 9:1 (but Lag:Prov. v. vi [[בְּחַעַס]] = [[בְּוַעַם]] Hb Hab 3:12 in wrath); so fig. Job 27:8 when Eloah cutteth off, draweth out, his soul; obj. om. their course, i.e. stop Joe 2:8 (cf. Hi-St); usually gain by violence or in gen. wrongfully Ez Eze 22:27; Pt. abs. Ps 10:3 = greedy getter, robber; & c. acc. cogn. [[בֶּ֫חַע]] Pr 1:19, Pr 15:27, Je 6:13, Je 8:10, Hb Hab 2:9.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. [[בִּצַּע]] La 2:17; Impf. [[יְבַצַּע]] Is 10:12; sf. [[יְבַצְּעֵנִי]] Is 38:12, Job 6:9; 2 fs. [[וַתְּבַצְּעִי]] Ez Eze 22:12; 3 fpl. [[תְּבַצָָּעְנׇה]] Zec 4:9; —cut off, (dis) sever (i.e. from life) Job 6:9 cf. Is 10:19 ([[מִדַּלָּה]]); = finish, complete Is 10:12, Zec 4:9; accomplish (= carry out, fulfil) La 2:17 (obj. [[אמרתו]]); violently make gain of, obj. pers. Ez Eze 22:12 (instr. [[בּעשׁק]]).
